Somethings you might want to try
- echo your CLASSPATH after exporting it. =
 Just to be sure that you have the
setting you think you have.
- Try settin=
g the classpath explicitly using the -cp flag.

Let us know if you got thin=
gs to work.

Big Mike

P.S. Any reason why your not starting with JUnit 4

=
